channel.title: Add a sign-in experience for mobile and desktop devices :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add a sign-in experience for mobile and desktop devices Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Add a intro paragraph specifically stating what scenarios this implementation is used for. When would i use this scenario over direct auth?
